name: Ceylon Since 1844 Organic English Breakfast Tea
description: Ceylon since 1844 Organic Ceylon tea is hand picked and processed which ensures a finely balanced and flavourful taste which is the hallmark of pure Ceylon Tea.A rich blend of black teas that gives a unique flavour profile, bright infusion and is a strong full bodied tea that is perfect for starting your day.25 pieces of envelope tea bags.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
